item.title: 香港贷款银行家赶在台风来临前获得签名
item.description: 香港即将来临的台风突显了全球金融中心的一些地区，尽管技术上十分先进，但开展业务仍然依赖于实物签名。【原文：The approaching typhoon in Hong Kong highlights how pockets of the global financial hub, for all its technological swagger, still depend on physical signatures to conduct business.】

item.title: 加密货币交易商押注新一轮波动，15 亿美元血本无归
item.description: 一轮超过 15 亿美元的清算再次凸显了加密货币市场的脆弱性，在没有明确触发因素的情况下展开，并让期权价格指向未来更多的波动。【原文：A more than $1.5 billion round of liquidations has again underscored the fragility of cryptocurrency markets, unfolding without a clear trigger and leaving option prices pointing to more volatility ahead.】

item.title: 阿达马斯警告：美国最初的磁铁供应无法满足未来需求
item.description: 据咨询公司 Adamas Intelligence 称，美国的稀土磁铁产能将在 2028 年左右短暂满足国内需求，之后高科技行业的快速增长将推动对更多供应的需求。【原文：The US will briefly have enough rare-earth magnet capacity to meet domestic demand around 2028, before rapid growth from high-tech sectors drives the need for even more supply, according to consultancy Adamas Intelligence.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 刚果总统捍卫钴配额以控制价格
item.description: 刚果民主共和国总统费利克斯-齐塞凯迪（Felix Tshisekedi）为对钴出口实行配额制的决定进行了辩护，认为这是增加该国从他认为应占主导地位的贸易中获利的一种方式。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo’s President Felix Tshisekedi defended a decision to put a quota on cobalt exports as a way to increase his country’s profit from a trade he says it should dominate.】

item.title: 前贝莱德高管为信贷对冲基金寻求 7 亿美元投资
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Neeraj Seth, a former chief investment officer at BlackRock Inc.’s Asia Pacific fundamental fixed income team, is looking to raise up to $700 million for a credit hedge fund, aiming to break into a niche where few independent players operate.】

item.title: 建筑商海泉加入中国重返美元债券市场的大潮
item.description: 今年，来自中国大陆、香港和澳门的大量发行商重新涌入离岸美元债券市场，推动债券发行总量达到 2022 年以来的最高水平。【原文：A deluge of issuers from mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau are storming back into the offshore dollar bond market this year, driving total issuance to its highest level since 2022.】

item.title: 贝恩称 8000 亿美元收入缺口威胁人工智能未来
item.description: 像 OpenAI 这样的人工智能公司很快就公布了斥资数千亿美元建设数据中心的计划，但它们却迟迟没有展示如何获得收入来支付所有这些开支。现在，咨询公司贝恩公司（Bain & Co.【原文：Artificial intelligence companies like OpenAI have been quick to unveil plans for spending hundreds of billions of dollars on data centers, but they have been slower to show how they will pull in revenue to cover all those expenses. Now, the consulting firm Bain & Co. is estimating the shortfall could be far larger than previously understood.】

item.title: 社交媒体巨头质疑专家就危害作证败诉
item.description: 洛杉矶一名法官裁定，在即将进行的针对科技公司平台造成伤害指控的审判中，陪审员将被允许听取有关社交媒体对年轻用户影响的专家证词。【原文：Jurors will be allowed to hear expert testimony about the impact of social media on young users during coming trials against tech companies over alleged harm caused by their platforms, a Los Angeles judge ruled.】

item.title: 英伟达称尽管与 OpenAI 达成了协议，但所有客户都将是 "优先 "客户
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）向客户保证，其与 OpenAI 签订的投资 1000 亿美元、共同扩展人工智能基础设施的里程碑式协议不会影响该芯片制造商与其他客户的关系。【原文：Nvidia Corp. assured customers that its landmark deal with OpenAI to invest $100 billion and expand AI infrastructure together won’t affect the chipmaker’s relationship with other clients.】

item.title: 中国的太阳能领军企业希望通过太阳能解决电网过剩问题
item.description: 中国的太阳能电池板第一大省计划加快发展其他可再生能源和电池储能技术，以继续推广清洁能源，同时应对中午电力过剩的问题。【原文：China’s top province for solar panels plans to accelerate the development of other renewables as well as battery storage, as it seeks to keep promoting clean energy while dealing with a glut of midday electricity.】

item.title: 美元走软，亚洲股市有望扩大领先美国股市的优势
item.description: 分析师认为，亚洲股市很可能继续超越美国股市，因为美元走软进一步提升了该地区的吸引力。【原文：Asian stocks will likely keep eclipsing their US peers, as a weaker dollar further raises the appeal of a region that has benefited from cheaper valuations and a momentous shift away from American assets, according to analysts.】

item.title: 研究发现：里夫斯可提高英国所得税并节省雇员开支
item.description: 据一家有影响力的智库称，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）可以通过针对养老金领取者、房东和自雇人士增加所得税，在不损害雇员利益的情况下增加 60 亿英镑（81 亿美元）的所得税。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves could raise £6 billion ($8.1 billion) of income tax without hurting employees by aiming increases at pensioners, landlords and the self-employed, according to an influential think tank.】

item.title: 印尼年度最大首次公开募股后，默迪卡黄金公司（Merdeka Gold）将首次亮相
item.description: PT Merdeka 黄金资源公司（PT Merdeka Gold Resources）将于本周二在雅加达开始交易，此前该矿商完成了今年印尼最大的首次公开募股。【原文：PT Merdeka Gold Resources is set to begin trading in Jakarta on Tuesday after the miner wrapped up Indonesia’s largest initial public offering this year.】

item.title: 马来西亚顶级股票嘉慕达（Gamuda）有望因增长而创下历史新高
item.description: 马来西亚基础设施公司 Gamuda Bhd 的收入将连年创下新高，这种乐观情绪促使一些分析师大幅提高了股价预测。【原文：Optimism that Malaysian infrastructure firm Gamuda Bhd. is set to achieve years of record revenues prompted some analysts to dramatically ramp up their share price forecasts.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望追随华尔街走高：市场综述
item.description: 周二早盘，亚洲股市似乎将小幅上扬，华尔街股市因大型科技公司再度表现乐观而受到提振。【原文：Asian stocks looked set for modest gains early Tuesday as Wall Street shares were lifted by renewed big tech optimism.】

item.title: 新西兰准备任命首位女性担任新西兰央行行长
item.description: 新西兰将首次任命一位女性担任央行行长，以重振因领导层动荡而受损的央行。【原文：New Zealand is set to appoint a woman to head its central bank for the first time as it seeks to refresh an institution damaged by leadership turmoil.】

item.title: 各国领导人抵达联合国之际，特朗普的飞机外交来到纽约
item.description: 接二连三的飞机订单通常是在巴黎、迪拜或新加坡举行的博览会上出现的。但本周，华盛顿和纽约将成为重大交易的惊喜之地。【原文：Back-to-back aircraft orders are typically the domain of expos held in Paris, Dubai or Singapore. But this week, Washington and New York stand to become the surprise venues of major deals.】

item.title: 默多克家族在 MySpace 上被 "烧伤"，寻求通过 TikTok 重返社交网络
item.description: 福克斯公司对 TikTok 的投资将为默多克媒体帝国提供一个拥有 1.7 亿美国用户的平台，用于推广从 NFL 到《辛普森一家》（The Simpsons —）等一系列电视节目，同时也为默多克家族赎回 20 年前对 MySpace 的灾难性收购提供了机会。【原文：A Fox Corp. investment in TikTok would give the Murdoch media empire a platform with 170 million US users to promote a broad range of TV programming — from the NFL to The Simpsons — and a chance to redeem the family’s catastrophic purchase of MySpace 20 years ago.】

item.title: 美国重新评估为内华达州锂矿提供的 23 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据不愿透露姓名的内部知情人士透露，特朗普政府正在重新评估乔-拜登总统批准的一笔 23 亿美元的贷款，这笔贷款用于开发内华达州的一个锂矿床。【原文：The Trump administration is re-evaluating a $2.3 billion loan approved by President Joe Biden for the development of a Nevada lithium deposit, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be named discussing internal business.】

item.title: 萤火虫公司发布首份财报后，因收入未达预期而下跌
item.description: 萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace Inc）在盘后交易中下跌，此前该公司公布的第二季度营收低于华尔街预期，因为这家小型火箭发射公司正努力提高飞行频率并赢得新合同。【原文：Firefly Aerospace Inc. fell in postmarket trading after it reported second-quarter revenue that fell short of Wall Street’s expectations, as the small-rocket launcher works to ramp up the frequency of its flights and win new contracts.】

item.title: 加拿大计划扩建液化天然气项目，TC 能源公司仍将赌注押在美国身上
item.description: 尽管有迹象表明加拿大正表现出更友好的能源立场，但 TC 能源公司仍将专注于增加美国投资，以满足急剧增长的电力需求。【原文：TC Energy will focus on ramping up US investments to meet soaring power demand despite signals Canada is showing a more energy-friendly stance.】

item.title: 甲骨文股价大涨后上调领导层继任计划
item.description: 近几个月来，甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）加快了高层领导的继任计划，因为该公司的云计算业务大幅加速，股市也随之上涨。【原文：Oracle Corp. accelerated its succession plans for top leadership in recent months following a massive acceleration in its cloud business and stock market rally.】

item.title: 劳动委员会称亚马逊对合同工拥有 "压倒性 "控制权
item.description: 美国劳工委员会的律师周一告诉法官，亚马逊公司对分包司机实施了 "压倒性的控制"，声称他们不是公司员工。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. exercised “overwhelming control” over subcontracted drivers it claimed weren’t its employees, US labor board attorneys told a judge Monday.】

item.title: 成本上升，美联储基金利率有望在区间内走高
item.description: 在过去两年中，有效联邦基金利率一直维持在美联储基准目标区间的底部附近，很快就会走高，这表明银行超额准备金的减少速度快于预期。【原文：The effective federal funds rate — which has held near the bottom of the Federal Reserve’s target range for its benchmark over the past two years — could soon edge higher in a sign that excess bank reserves are dwindling faster than expected.】

item.title: 锡克分离主义组织领导人因加拿大枪支指控被捕
item.description: 加拿大锡克教正义组织的领导人因十几项枪支指控被捕，这是他的前任在不列颠哥伦比亚省被枪杀两年后的事，此案引发了与印度的地缘政治裂痕。【原文：The leader of Sikhs for Justice in Canada was arrested on a dozen firearms charges, two years after his predecessor was gunned down in British Columbia and the case sparked a geopolitical rift with India.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯原油流量和炼油厂罢工，石油价格下滑
item.description: 由于交易商分析了欧盟对俄罗斯供应采取的最新举措以及乌克兰对欧佩克+成员国能源基础设施的罢工所产生的影响，石油价格下跌。【原文：Oil declined as traders parsed through the impact of the European Union’s latest moves on Russian supplies and strikes by Ukraine on the OPEC+ member’s energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 市政债券基金因押注美联储降息而吸引大量现金
item.description: 根据 CreditSights Inc. 的数据，本月初投资者向市政债券基金投入的现金至少是 2007 年以来最多的。【原文：Investors poured the most cash into municipal-bond funds earlier this month since at least 2007, according to CreditSights Inc.】
